periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 4am. Mostly clear. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. East northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 84. East northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. East southeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 82. Southeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 70. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 84. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 71. South wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 89. South southwest wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly clear, with a low around 74. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 92. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 74. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 92. Southwest wind around 7 mph.
